00001 /* bpred-skewed.cpp: skewed predictor [Michaud et al., ISCA 1997] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include <math.h>
00007 #define COMPONENT_NAME "skewed"
00008 
00009 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00011 {
00012   int l1_size;
00013   int l2_size;
00014   int his_width;
00015   int partial_update;
00016   int enhanced;
00017   int double_bim; /* make first table 2x the size */
00018 
00019   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&l2_size,&his_width,&partial_update,&enhanced,&double_bim) != 7)
00020     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"skewed:name:l1_size:l2_size:his_width:partial_update:enhanced:double-bim\")",opt_string);
00021   return new bpred_skewed_t(name,l1_size,l2_size,his_width,partial_update,enhanced,double_bim);
00022 }
00023 #else
00024 
00025 class bpred_skewed_t:public bpred_dir_t
00026 {
00027   class bpred_skewed_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00028   {
00029     public:
00030     my2bc_t * pht_ctr[3];
00031     int * bhr;
00032     int pred;
00033     int lookup_bhr;
00034   };
00035 
00036   protected:
00037 
00038   bool partial_update;
00039   bool enhanced;
00040   bool double_bim;
00041   int bht_size;
00042   int bht_mask;
00043   int * bht;
00044   int pht_size;
00045   int pht_mask;
00046   my2bc_t ** pht;
00047   int history_length;
00048   int history_mask;
00049   int half_length;
00050   int half_mask;
00051   int high_mask;
00052 
00053   public:
00054 
00055   /* CREATE */
00056   bpred_skewed_t(char * const arg_name,
00057                  const int arg_bht_size,
00058                  const int arg_pht_size,
00059                  const int arg_history_length,
00060                  const int arg_partial_update,
00061                  const int arg_enhanced,
00062                  const int arg_double_bim
00063                 )
00064   {
00065     init();
00066 
00067     /* verify arguments are valid */
00068     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00069     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_pht_size);
00070     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00071     CHECK_BOOL(arg_enhanced);
00072     CHECK_BOOL(arg_double_bim);
00073     CHECK_BOOL(arg_partial_update);
00074 
00075     name = strdup(arg_name);
00076     if(!name)
00077       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed name (strdup)");
00078     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00079     if(!type)
00080       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed type (strdup)");
00081 
00082     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00083     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00084     pht_size = arg_pht_size;
00085     pht_mask = arg_pht_size-1;
00086     history_length = arg_history_length;
00087     history_mask = (1<<arg_history_length)-1;
00088     half_length = log_base2(arg_pht_size);
00089     half_mask = pht_mask;
00090     high_mask = arg_pht_size>>1;
00091     partial_update = arg_partial_update;
00092     enhanced = arg_enhanced;
00093     double_bim = arg_double_bim;
00094 
00095     bht = (int*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(int));
00096     if(!bht)
00097       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed BHT");
00098     pht = (my2bc_t**) calloc(3,sizeof(my2bc_t*));
00099     if(!pht)
00100       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed pht");
00101     if(double_bim)
00102       pht[0] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(2*pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00103     else
00104       pht[0] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00105     pht[1] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00106     pht[2] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00107     if(!pht[0] || !pht[1] || !pht[2])
00108       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed PHT");
00109     for(int i=0;i<pht_size;i++)
00110     {
00111       pht[0][i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00112       if(double_bim)
00113       pht[0][pht_size+i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00114       pht[1][i] = (!(i&1))?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00115       pht[2][i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00116     }
00117 
00118     if(double_bim)
00119       bits = bht_size*history_length + pht_size*8;
00120     else
00121       bits = bht_size*history_length + pht_size*6;
00122   }
00123 
00124   /* DESTROY */
00125   ~bpred_skewed_t()
00126   {
00127     free(pht[0]); pht[0] = NULL;
00128     free(pht[1]); pht[1] = NULL;
00129     free(pht[2]); pht[2] = NULL;
00130     free(pht); pht = NULL;
00131     free(bht); bht = NULL;
00132   }
00133 
00134   /* LOOKUP */
00135   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00136   {
00137     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_skewed_sc_t*) scvp;
00138     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00139     int l2index_base;
00140     int v1, v2;
00141     int l2index[3];
00142     bool pred;
00143 
00144     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00145     l2index_base = (PC<<history_length)|*sc->bhr;
00146 
00147     v2 = (l2index_base >> half_length) & half_mask;
00148     v1 = l2index_base & half_mask;
00149 
00150     /* f0 */
00151     if(!enhanced)
00152       l2index[0] = ((v1>>1)|((v1&high_mask) ^ ((v1&1) << (half_length-1)))) /* H(v1) */
00153                ^ ((v2<<1)|(((v2&high_mask) ^ ((v2&(high_mask>>1))<<1))>>(half_length-1))) /* Hinv(v2) */
00154                ^ v2;
00155     else
00156       l2index[0] = PC;
00157 
00158     /* f1 */
00159     l2index[1] = ((v1>>1)|((v1&high_mask) ^ ((v1&1) << (half_length-1)))) /* H(v1) */
00160                ^ ((v2<<1)|(((v2&high_mask) ^ ((v2&(high_mask>>1))<<1))>>(half_length-1))) /* Hinv(v2) */
00161                ^ v1;
00162 
00163     /* f2 */
00164     l2index[2] = ((v2>>1)|((v2&high_mask) ^ ((v2&1) << (half_length-1)))) /* H(v2) */
00165                ^ ((v1<<1)|(((v1&high_mask) ^ ((v1&(high_mask>>1))<<1))>>(half_length-1))) /* Hinv(v1) */
00166                ^ v2;
00167 
00168     if(double_bim)
00169       l2index[0] &= (pht_mask<<1)|1;
00170     else
00171       l2index[0] &= pht_mask;
00172     l2index[1] &= pht_mask;
00173     l2index[2] &= pht_mask;
00174 
00175     sc->pht_ctr[0] = &pht[0][l2index[0]];
00176     sc->pht_ctr[1] = &pht[1][l2index[1]];
00177     sc->pht_ctr[2] = &pht[2][l2index[2]];
00178 
00179     pred  = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[0]);
00180     pred += MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[1]);
00181     pred += MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[2]);
00182 
00183     pred >>= 1;
00184 
00185     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00186 
00187     sc->pred = pred;
00188     sc->updated = false;
00189     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00190 
00191     return pred;
00192   }
00193 
00194   /* UPDATE */
00195   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00196   {
00197     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_skewed_sc_t*) scvp;
00198 
00199     if(sc->pred==outcome && partial_update)
00200     {
00201       if(MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[0]) == outcome)
00202         MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[0],outcome);
00203       if(MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[1]) == outcome)
00204         MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[1],outcome);
00205       if(MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pht_ctr[2]) == outcome)
00206         MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[2],outcome);
00207     }
00208     else
00209     {
00210       MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[0],outcome);
00211       MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[1],outcome);
00212       MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pht_ctr[2],outcome);
00213     }
00214 
00215     if(!sc->updated)
00216     {
00217         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00218         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00219         sc->updated = true;
00220     }
00221   }
00222 
00223   /* SPEC_UPDATE */
00224   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00225   {
00226     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_skewed_sc_t*) scvp;
00227     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00228 
00229     *sc->bhr = ((*sc->bhr<<1)|our_pred)&history_mask;
00230   }
00231 
00232   /* RECOVER */
00233   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00234   {
00235     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_skewed_sc_t*) scvp;
00236     if(bht_size == 1)
00237         bht[0] = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00238   }
00239 
00240   /* FLUSH */
00241   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00242   {
00243     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_skewed_sc_t*) scvp;
00244     if(bht_size == 1)
00245       bht[0] = sc->lookup_bhr;
00246   }
00247 
00248   /* GET_CACHE */
00249   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00250   {
00251     class bpred_skewed_sc_t * sc = new bpred_skewed_sc_t();
00252     if(!sc)
00253       fatal("couldn't malloc skewed State Cache");
00254     return sc;
00255   }
00256 
00257 };
00258 
00259 
00260 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00261 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
